beer.beer_description:
Deep in the reeds of the River Stour, it lies in wait. Patiently. Ready for unsuspecting prey. Once feared by those who fish these waters, was the ferocious bite of the infamous Blandford Fly. Craftier fishermen know of a different Blandford Fly...

One with a sweeter side and refreshing notes of ginger (said to soothe the dastardly fly’s bite). And with hints of toffee to offset the spice, we think you’ll agree this unique golden ale is quite the catch.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 55 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 12!

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 180 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 37!

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 160 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 33!

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 190 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 39!

items.checkin_comment: Nice and spiced!! A lovely ale for a winters day!!

user.bio: Hi… I like beer… yup, that should do it…

items.badge_description: That's at least one beer a day for seven days. Looks like you had quite the sudsy week. Cheers!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

One with a sweeter side and refreshing notes of ginger (said to soothe the dastardly fly’s bite). And with hints of toffee to offset the spice, we think you’ll agree this unique golden ale is quite the catch.

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 405 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 82!

Feel the burn! No, not from your pre-beer work out, but from the spiced beverage you are now partaking of. That's 5 different beers with the style of Spiced / Herbed. Gruit / Ancient Herbed Ale or Chilli / Chile Beer. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description:
Whether you’re having a room party or hanging at the hotel bar, you know the essential part of any trip, an awesome beer!

That's a beer at 20 different venues categorized as a Hotel! Visit 5 more different ones for Level 5!
